Isto significa que o mod não é capaz de operar e foi desligado.
BOB, o substituto de árvore e props, não conseguiu completar os patches necessários do Harmony.
As possíveis causas deste problema incluem:
A dependência necessária do mod Harmony 2 não foi instalada
Um mod desatualizado e/ou quebrado está impedindo que o Harmony 2 funcione corretamente
Introducing map tree replacement! Activate the BOB tool as usual and click on a free-standing tree.
Fix intermittent building replacement panel exception when changing target item.
Fix potential race conditions on game load
Fix probability refresh when reverting TO an all-building or all-network replacement
Fix LODs not refreshing after reverting all-network or all-building replacements
Adjust info panel textfield labels to fit longer translation strings
Initial implementation of network replacement packs
Agora devidamente compatível com Network Skins 2
New tree/prop list layout, with icons to indicate which type of replacement is active
Add configurations management for handling multiple different configuration files, accessible through the options panel
Agora é possível selecionar redes em edifícios
Agora é possível selecionar edifícios de decoração
Add ascending/descending name sort filters to lists
Add ability to remove terrain ruining from all trees and/or props (in the options panel)
Ferry paths are now selectable (to change/hide those ferry path marker buoys)
Fix network prop angles sometimes being incorrectly displayed on selection
Adicionar substituição de prop da rede individual
Adicionar opção para tornar fios em redes (linhas de energia e catenárias ferroviárias) de tamanho mais realista
As alterações agora são pré-visualizadas em tempo real
Change to User Interface: choose between replacement modes before applying changes
Change to User Interface: a dedicated 'hide' button to automatically set probabilities to zero
Translation framework has been updated to use CrowdIn
Trees no longer have an angle setting, as this will always be overridden by any mod implementing random tree rotation
Improve handling of props with special attributes
Outras pequenas IU e melhorias funcionais
Combined prop/tree mode - replace props with trees, or vice-versa
Adjust spacing betwen repeating network props (individual mode only)
Underground mode to select tunnels (PageDown/PageUp to switch)
Lights can now be added or removed in-game (restarting is no longer required to update lighting effects)
Prop/tree position highlighting is dimmed while shift is pressed, and completely turned off while alt is pressed

Add option to disable the game's tree tool road tree replacement.  Using this option disables the tool's snap-to-network function and allows manual placement of trees near (or on, using an Anarchy mod) roads.
Grande novidade: adicionar props para a construção de pré-fabricados.
Adicionar atalho para alternar a desativação da ferramenta de árvore vanilla (padrão Ctrl-Shift-T)
Novo recurso importante: adicionar props a prefabs de rede.
